jmf.data

Class OutReply

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmf.data.OutReply

  • public class OutReply
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an outgoing reply message. Can be NO_REPLY (no reply will be sent), IMMEDIATE_REPLY (reply now) or FUTURE_REPLY (allows replying in the future) Improvment idea: Factory + different classes Created on 7/25/15.
    Author:
    Tobias Korb, Jan Strau√ü
